Version 0.9.5.5

Added two new cheats to "Experimental" Mode:

* Big Jump (player can jump very high)
* One Punch (defeat enemies with one hit)

Additionally, the "Infinite Ammo" cheat now includes unbreakable melee weapons, including the Chainsaw.

The experimental game mode is a paid feature and costs $4.99 (unlocked with in-app purchase).

If you have any questions or suggestions, please let us know at info@dream-dev.com.

Thank you very much!

----

Version 0.9.5.4

In this update, we've introduced a new "Experimental" game mode.

In the Experimental game mode, players have the ability to use cheats and begin the game from any checkpoint.

This game mode is not connected to your game progress or leaderboards.

Currently available cheats include "God Mode," "All Weapons," and "Infinite Ammo."

If you enjoy the idea, we will consider adding additional cheats to the game.

The experimental game mode is a paid feature and costs $4.99 (unlocked with in-app purchase).

If you have any questions or suggestions, please let us know at info@dream-dev.com.

Thank you very much!

----

Version 0.9.5.2

- Moved the game to a new version of the engine to ensure longer support.

- Fixed a bug where some items could disappear below the floor level.

If you encounter any bugs in the game or have suggestions for improvements, please feel free to contact us at info@dream-dev.com.

Thank you!

Regards,
Dream Dev Studio.

-----

Version 0.9.5.1

Update for the MR game mode:

1. Fixed some bugs and made improvements to the MR game mode.

2. We made some adjustments to the game difficulty in the MR game mode.

BEGINNER is now significantly easier.
ADVANCED is slightly easier.
EXPERT difficulty without changes.

Please share your feedback on the new game mode with us at info@dream-dev.com.

Thank you!

---

Version 0.9.5

BIG UPDATE with Mixed Reality (MR) mode for all Meta Quest 2 & 3 owners! 

We've introduced an exciting new game mode. As always, it's free for existing players.

Please share your feedback on the new game mode with us at info@dream-dev.com.

Thank you!
----

Version 0.9.47

The Christmas party is over.

The new update featuring Mixed Reality is on its way and will be available soon.

---

Version 0.9.46

Holiday Update! Merry Christmas and Happy New Year 2024!

The new Christmas update is available for download!

In this update:

- Horizon Lab Station made a lot of preparations for Christmas in Campaign + co-op + Challenges modes.

- For Meta Quest 2 owners, new edged and bladed weapons, as well as a chainsaw, have been added (Meta Quest 3 owners already have these).

If you have any ideas for game improvement, visit: https://deathhorizon.horizonlab.info/

Thank you!

Halloween's party is over.

The Horizon Lab station is back to its normal state, eagerly anticipating Christmas.

Version 0.9.42

Dear friends,

We are delighted to announce that a new game update is now available for download.

In this update, we have expanded the game’s settings, implemented numerous game improvements, and resolved various bugs.

New settings:

- Added the possibility to play in sitting mode.
- Introduced a left-handed mode.
- Included the option to change the gun angle.
- Implemented the ability to hold weapons without continuously pressing a button.
- Added the option to turn off blood effects.

Improvements:

- Improved the functionality of melee weapons.
- Improved FPS stability and reduced FPS drops.
- Achieved smoother zombie animations.
- Updated bHaptics to the latest version.

Bug fixes:

- Fixed several bugs in the co-op game.
- Improved puzzle work in Scene 5.
- Made UI fixes in the main menu
- And some other bug fixes and improvements

If you come across any bugs in the game or have ideas on how we can enhance your gaming experience, please don’t hesitate to reach out to us at info@dream-dev.com.

MESSAGE FOR QUEST 1 OWNERS:

Regrettably, due to technical limitations, we are unable to provide ongoing support for Quest 1 in our upcoming game updates. This update and all future updates will exclusively be accessible for Quest 2, Quest PRO, and our forthcoming devices.

Nevertheless, you can still download and enjoy the last stable version of the game.

Best regards,
Dream Dev Studio.

Version 0.9.41, bug fix update:

Thank you all for your messages regarding the recent issue with VoIP.

If you encounter any bugs or issues, please do not hesitate to contact us at info@dream-dev.com.

Thank you.
